duties_responsibilities.duty: Run events at the venue as a Lighting Director or Lead Stage Hand.
Work on venue changeovers and event setup to ensure smooth operations.
Maintain a safe working environment by operating events as a Lighting Designer, Sound Engineer, or Video Operator.
Recommend equipment purchases and ensure production equipment is in good working order.
Facilitate staff training, participate in weekly production meetings, and maintain a broad knowledge of technology and equipment.
Participate in professional development activities and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a performing arts field or 2-3 years of experience in a performing arts roadhouse or on tour with a national level act.
